recordTypes.name: E1_License
recordTypes.description: Obtain a contractor's license for authorization to perform permitted work within a Town right-of-way or property.

recordTypes.name: E2_Right of Way Permit
recordTypes.description: Permit for excavation and other work within Town right-of-way. (This is the base permit application that will be used for most permits.)

recordTypes.name: QOL Violation Ticket Review Meeting Application (copied from boroughofbathpa)
Pay Tickets Online (Parking or Quality of Life) (copied from boroughofbathpa)
IC/Housing Citation
recordTypes.description: Use this type of record for Citations

recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this type of permit for residential or commercial construction. Please use proper trade permit for respective work

recordTypes.name: Administrative Zoning Permit
recordTypes.description: Administrative Zoning Permit for work that does not require Building Department approval

recordTypes.name: IC/Housing Citation  Copy
recordTypes.description: Use this type of record for Citations

recordTypes.name: IC/Housing Citation  Copy #2
recordTypes.description: Use this type of record for Citations

recordTypes.name: Zoning Compliance Review
recordTypes.description: This application is for those who wish to obtain a written compliance review of a property

recordTypes.name: IC/Housing Citation  Copy #3
recordTypes.description: Use this type of record for Citations

recordTypes.name: Building Permit Copy_1
recordTypes.description: Use this type of permit for residential or commercial construction. Please use proper trade permit for respective work.

recordTypes.name: Complaint/Incident/Fire Calls
recordTypes.description: Use this form to file a complaint with the Building Division over building safety or welfare.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit Rev_1
recordTypes.description: Use this form to obtain a building permit.

recordTypes.name: Complaint/Incident/Fire Calls TESTING COPY
recordTypes.description: Use this form to file a complaint with the Building Division over building safety or welfare.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: This type of permit is for work involving electricity such as new wiring or changing devices.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description:
Use this type of permit for piping work (water, drain, waste, and vent; or gas)
**Please NOTE: Town Ordinance does not allow for Residential Properties to install/replace underground fuel tanks of any type.

recordTypes.name: HVAC Permit
recordTypes.description:
Use this permit type for heating, air conditioning, gas piping, propane tanks, or similar work.

**Please NOTE: Town Ordinance does not allow for Residential Properties to install/replace underground fuel tanks of any type.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit Copy_1
recordTypes.description: This type of permit is for work involving electricity such as new wiring or changing devices.

recordTypes.name: Photovoltaic Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is used for photovoltaic (solar electrical) installations.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this for completely demolishing a building or structure.  NOT FOR INTERIOR DEMOLITIONS.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit Copy_1
recordTypes.description:
Use this type of permit for piping work (water, drain, waste, and vent; or gas)
**Please NOTE: Town Ordinance does not allow for Residential Properties to install/replace underground fuel tanks of any type.

recordTypes.name: Fire Sprinkler Permit
recordTypes.description:
Use this type of permit for new sprinkler system installations or modifications to NFPA 13, 13D, & 13R systems.

Also to include Standpipes NFPA 14, Pumps, Tanks & Fire Mains NFPA 20, 22 & 24.

recordTypes.name: Fire Suppression Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this type of permit for Hood systems NFPA 17 & 17A, Clean Agent Systems ie, FM-200, etc. NFPA 2001, Water Spray & Foam Water Spray NFPA 15 & 16.

recordTypes.name: Fire Alarm System Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this type of permit for new fire alarm systems or changes to existing installations NFPA 72.  Fire Alarm shop drawings separate from the Electrical drawings are required.

categories.content:
